topic.title: Physician Reading Study Performer - conformance rules

ol.li: MAY contain zero or one [0..1] time (CONF:8425)

SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] assignedEntity (CONF:8426)
This assignedEntity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:8427)
This assignedEntity SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:10033)
This assignedEntity The id SHOULD include zero or one [0..1] id where id/@root ="2.16.840.1.113883.4.6" National Provider Identifier (CONF:10034)
This assignedEntity SHALL contain a valid DICOM personal identification code sequence (@codeSystem is 1.2.840.10008.2.16.4) or an appropriate national health care provider coding system (e.g., NUCC in the U.S., where @code is 2.16.840.1.113883.6.101).
This assignedEntity Every assignedEntity element SHALL have at least one assignedPerson or representedOrganization. (CONF:8429)
